rooms.name: Enviro-Field
rooms.description: This selection vaporizes the player instantly. Game Over.

rooms.name: Docking Bay
rooms.description:
You glance around the Docking Bay. It acts as a structure jutting from the starboard side of the ship, providing room for landing and loading. 
The vast port your ship entered through generates a crackling enviro-field, holding in what little toxic atmosphere that remains. 
You cannot make out any more details due to the dim emergency lighting. 

- To the West, you see the bay doors exit.

pointsOfInterest.name: scrambler
pointsOfInterest.description:
The mk39 high-band frequency scrambler/unscrambler. AKA 'The Garage Door Opener.' 
Makes quick work of electronically locked doors.

pointsOfInterest.name: ship
pointsOfInterest.description:
The E.D.F.S. Spartan rests precariously on its twisted landing struts. Every few seconds her hull groans as Zhang shifts his weight inside. 
She's seen better days, but you're still breathing. 

You silently mouth words of appreciation.

rooms.name: Junction Hallway 1
rooms.description:
This hallway divides the ship into the stern and bow sectors. An environ-panel hangs open, the oxygen pipe here has been siphoned. 
The dim red light pervades this area, too, allowing you to barely make out the signage off 3 exits. 
It seems dumb for everything to be labeled grey, how frustrating. 

- To the North, you spot a grey stripe labeled with "Crew Bays" leading to the door. 
- To the South, you spot another grey stripe, this one doubled, labeled "Cargo/Engineering Sector". 
- To the East, you spot a final grey stripe on the open bay doors, you can vaguely make out the silhouette of your ship in the distance.

items.name: pipes
items.fullName: a panel containing a section of the ship's Atmo-Ducts, maybe there's breathable air inside

pointsOfInterest.name: pipes
pointsOfInterest.description:
Atmo-ducting. This heap isn't producing atmosphere anymore, but if you bleed the lines a bit with your suit you might be able to 
siphon off some nearby gases in them.
pointsOfInterest.usedDescr: Atmo-ducting. You've siphoned off what you could from here, already.
